section.title: Developers' Checklist
section.para: This section provides a general overview of how to develop &lsb;-compliant applications.

Developers that want to write &lsb;-compliant applications should be sure to follow the checklist below. More information about the items in the checklist is available in the remaining sections of this guide.
Only use APIs that are specified in sections IV, V, or VI of the &glsb;.
Do not rely on commands not specified by the &lsb; specifications.
Package your application in the &rpm; format described in the
Appendix of Maximum &rpm;. Do not use RPM triggers.
